notes: Seti Astro Suite Pro V1.4.14 Added modified astrometric solutions for any ROI/preview if the parent had an astrometric solution. Stacking setting profiles. Gray and Custom color Themes.  Reverted star alignment to be less resource intense while still doing robust distortion correction. For highly spatially non-flat images I still need better distortion.  Fixed Stat curves boost to be the original SASv2 curves boost logic. Fixed mask bug in Star Spike adder. Other bug fixes.
